The minor is not open to physics majors.

courseSection0.text: The minor is not open to physics majors.

li.A minimum GPA of 2.0 is required in all: A minimum GPA of 2.0 is required in all courses used to satisfy the minor.
li.Grades below \"C\" (2.0) in lower level: Grades below "C" (2.0) in lower level courses are not accepted.
li.At least 9 hours used in the minor must: At least 9 hours used in the minor must be earned at UCF within the Department of Physics.
li.Students must satisfy each course's prer: Students must satisfy each course's prerequisites before enrolling in the class.

courseSection0.text:
Minor Requirements
A minimum GPA of 2.0 is required in all courses used to satisfy the minor.
Grades below "C" (2.0) in lower level courses are not accepted.
At least 9 hours used in the minor must be earned at UCF within the Department of Physics.
Prerequisite Courses
Students must satisfy each course's prerequisites before enrolling in the class.

courseSection0.text0:
Earn at least 4 credits from the following course sets: 
PHY 2048C
PHY2048C - General Physics Using Calculus I Studio (4)
PHY 2048 and 2048L
PHY2048 - General Physics Using Calculus I (3)
PHY2048L - General Physics Using Calculus I Laboratory (1)
courseSection0.text1:
Earn at least 4 credits from the following course sets: 
PHY 2049C
PHY2049C - General Physics Using Calculus II Studio (4)
PHY 2049 and 2049L
PHY2049 - General Physics Using Calculus II (3)
PHY2049L - General Physics Using Calculus II Laboratory (1)
courseSection0.text2:
Complete the following: 
PHY3101 - General Physics Using Calculus III (3)

courseSection1.text0:
Earn at least 9 credits from the following types of courses: 
Select from upper-level physics lecture or laboratory courses appropriate for majors

li.Internship, Co-op, or Independent Study: Internship, Co-op, or Independent Study credit cannot be used toward the minor.

courseSection1.text:
Other Requirements

Internship, Co-op, or Independent Study credit cannot be used toward the minor.
